This ancient recipe has been used for generations as a reliable means of filling an Elemental Orb with icy power.
The following materials must be blended in perfect harmony:

- 100 Elemental Shards
- 1 Elemental Orb
- 5 Hoar Frost Shards

The fusion recipe disappears as soon as you accept this quest.

You are short of materials.

- 100 Elemental Shards
- 1 Elemental Orb
- 5 Hoar Frost Shards

Collect these items to receive a Hoar Frost Orb.
You will receive a reward once you have collected the items.
